Package eg.ui.tabpane

Class ExtTabbedPane

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JTabbedPane
eg.ui.tabpane.ExtTabbedPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public final class ExtTabbedPane
extends javax.swing.JTabbedPane
The JTabbedPane for the editor.

Uses ExtTabbedPaneUI for the tabbar appearance

See Also:

  • Method Details

    • showTabbar

      public void showTabbar​(boolean b)
      Shows or hides the tabbar
      Parameters:
      b - true to show the tabbar, false to hide
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - if b is false while more than one tab is open

    • addTab

      public void addTab​(java.lang.String title, java.awt.Component c, FunctionalAction closeAct)
      Adds a new tab
      Parameters:
      title - the title for the tab
      c - the component to be displayed when the tab is selected
      closeAct - the closing action
